original: intros d s c p a Hs_ref_ok Hget Hp_occ. apply (Hs_ref_ok a p). - apply Hget. - intros Hex. destruct (pl_coacc_contain_coacc_ads d p a Hp_occ Hex) as [Hs' Hcoacc]. unfold st_coacc. destruct s. + simpl. rewrite Hcoacc. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite Hcoacc. reflexivity.
